pkgmetadata.longdescription: Mental Health Quality of Life Toolkit // Transforms, calculates, and presents results from the Mental Health Quality of Life Questionnaire (MHQoL), a measure of health-related quality of life for individuals with mental health conditions. Provides scoring functions, summary statistics, and visualization tools to facilitate interpretation. For more details see van Krugten et al.(2022) doi:10.1007/s11136-021-02935-w.
